comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:8.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0.1
Build ID: 20111120135848

Steps to reproduce:

Inconsistency 1. Placed the New Tab and Tag Groups buttons on the Navigation Toolbar.
---
Inconsistency 2. Placed the zoom controls on the Navigation Toolbar.
---
Inconsistency 3. Enabled small icons on the Navigation Toolbar.


Actual results:

Inconsistency 1. New Tab and Tab Groups buttons on the Navigation Toobar appear padded and white, while the other buttons appear padded and black.
---
Inconsistency 2. Zoom controls on the Navigation Toolbar appear separated.
---
Inconsistency 3. Small icons on Navigation Toolbar are missing their padding and blue glow.


Expected results:

Inconsistency 1. New Tab and Tab Groups buttons on the Navigation Toolbar should appear padded and black, consistent with the rest of the buttons.
---
Inconsistency 2. Zoom controls on Navigation Toolbar should appear as a double button.
---
Inconsistency 3. Small icons on Navigation Toolbar should retain their padding and blue glow.


*note the rest of the Toolbars appear correctly with all buttons as shown in the pictures below the Navigation Toolbar.
